query: Comprehensive quantum computing landscape survey for 2024-2025 investment decision. Detailed research across hardware platforms, software ecosystem, error correction, commercial applications, key players, technology readiness, and investment trends. Require 3+ authoritative sources per area, focus on technical depth and board-level clarity.
